title: Create persistent alert event model + retrieval API for monitoring (fit drift/segment changes/emerging cohorts)

sections.text: Implement the data model/storage for normalized alert events as defined in [GOLD-40] (type, entity references, timestamps, computed metrics, thresholds, evaluation window, and dedupe key). Add backend query APIs to list and fetch alert events with filtering (by alert type, segment/customer, time range) and pagination for downstream UI/notification delivery. Ensure idempotent writes and basic retention/archival defaults appropriate for low-priority monitoring.
